alert.note: Alert for Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 4:18PM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor looding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Yates. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen with additional thunderstorms approaching the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Penn Yan, Benton, Potter, Middlesex, Italy, Rushville, Dresden, Yatesville, Guyanoga, Ferguson Corners, Vine Valley, Milo Center, Mays Mills, Friend, Italy Hill, Milo Mills and Bellona Stn. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
